ygData.subject: RE: Lute of the Gypsy Princess and other lutes.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She let him stand around for a sec, then he starfired her. hehe. As soon as I died I /consent d him, CR was merely asking a level 30 cleric to rez me.  I
ygData.messageBody:
> BTW, so what did Sog do until / when the charm wore off? Did he
> gate/succor/evac out?

She let him stand around for a sec, then he starfired her.
hehe.

As soon as I died I /consent'd him, CR was merely asking a level
30 cleric to rez me. I don't care about exp these days. I donated
enough money to buy 1/3 of her level 34 spells. I had a great
time in there, despite the fact Sog kicked my butt.

Our charm becomes useless after level 37. I used to just charm
back our team members who got charmed. But since everyone I play
with is > L37, same rules apply. Too high to be charmed. Otherwise
I would have charmed him back, and made him starfire her.

Harmonic.
